org.apache.flink.runtime.checkpoint.savepoint

类 SavepointStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.checkpoint.savepoint.SavepointStore

  • public class SavepointStore
extends java.lang.Object
    Utilities for storing and loading savepoint meta data files.

    Stored savepoints have the following format: 

     MagicNumber SavepointVersion Savepoint
   - MagicNumber => int
   - SavepointVersion => int (returned by Savepoint#getVersion())
   - Savepoint => bytes (serialized via version-specific SavepointSerializer)

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      (专用程序包) static java.lang.String EXTERNALIZED_CHECKPOINT_METADATA_FILE
      Metadata file for an externalized checkpoint, random suffix added during store, because the parent directory is not unique.
      private static org.slf4j.Logger LOG 
      static int MAGIC_NUMBER
      Magic number for sanity checks against stored savepoints.
      private static java.lang.String SAVEPOINT_METADATA_FILE

      • createSavepointDirectory

        public static java.lang.String createSavepointDirectory(@Nonnull
                                                        java.lang.String baseDirectory,
                                                        @Nullable
                                                        JobID jobId)
                                                 throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a savepoint directory.
        参数:
        baseDirectory - Base target directory for the savepoint
        jobId - Optional JobID the savepoint belongs to
        返回:
        The created savepoint directory
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - FileSystem operation failures are forwarded

        参数:

        savepoint - Savepoint to be stored

      • loadSavepoint

        public static Savepoint loadSavepoint(java.lang.String savepointFileOrDirectory,
                                      java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader)
                               throws java.io.IOException
        Loads the savepoint at the specified path.
        参数:
        savepointFileOrDirectory - Path to the parent savepoint directory or the meta data file.
        classLoader - The class loader used to resolve serialized classes from legacy savepoint formats.
        返回:
        The loaded savepoint
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Failures during load are forwarded

      • loadSavepointWithHandle

        public static Tuple2<Savepoint,StreamStateHandle> loadSavepointWithHandle(java.lang.String savepointFileOrDirectory,
                                                                          java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader)
                                                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Loads the savepoint at the specified path. This methods returns the savepoint, as well as the handle to the metadata.
        参数:
        savepointFileOrDirectory - Path to the parent savepoint directory or the meta data file.
        classLoader - The class loader used to resolve serialized classes from legacy savepoint formats.
        返回:
        The loaded savepoint
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Failures during load are forwarded

      • removeSavepointFile

        public static void removeSavepointFile(java.lang.String path)
                                throws java.io.IOException
        Removes the savepoint meta data w/o loading and disposing it.
        参数:
        path - Path of savepoint to remove
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Failures during disposal are forwarded
